availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Lysles Williams in Allen County, Kentucky on October 15, 1834. Father of Sarah P. Williams, Mary E. Williams, Nancy M. Williams, Thomas H. Williams, L. E. Williams, W. W. Williams, Matilda B. Williams, and George W. Williams. Farmer in Allen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 340-341.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Precinct No. 1, p. 147A.
"George W. Williams (1808-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial #66006571, accessed July 1, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66006571.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 21.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Allen County Wills, vol. D-E, 1825-1902.
